review.comment_positive: Clean place, room, perfect shower, comfortable bed, minibar, hairdryer. Lift.

review.comment_positive: Quiet little street, 4min. walk to main road. Very clean place, room. Bed? Nice to sleep in it. Good quality, nice, solid dark timber furniture, minibar, hairdryer, safe, plenty of lights. Perfect, clean bathroom with excellent rain head shower. Shower gel, shampoo. Lift. Friendly and helpful Reception.
review.comment_negative: In 2023 TV has only analogue channels with poor picture quality and not much in English. In fact when you click on List (of channels) it shows you about 200 of Digital channels but there is no access to them. And... complicated way of switching On TV. There is no real window but it didn't worry me as I spent little time in the room. I cut one * because of TV.

review.comment_positive: Staff was friendly

review.comment_positive: The most enjoyable thing during our stay was the welcoming and smiley receptionist who made us feel like staying at a friend's place. The hotel is in the backpacker area with many others and often comes with reasonable price - so so quality. However, this one is quite exceptional where things are brand new & top notch, and much better than what you can get for twenty bucks.
